image:image.image:title: Youth Race and Family - Why Tejas Trails Family Is Important to Us
image:image.image:caption: When we got married and started a family, we got to see first hand the impact our involvement in training and racing had on a family. Krissy has always supported Chris's racing, but waiting at long races with a little one was tough. This led us to create Tejas Trails events with families in mind, offering activities for everyone. Beyond racing, we're driven by a desire to make a positive impact. After the loss of our baby boy, Shepperd Lee, in 2016, we committed to honoring his life by enriching others'. Now, with two school-aged daughters, we are driven to foster environments that bring people closer together and cultivate lifelong connections. Tejas Trails is more than just runningit's about bringing people together and creating lasting memories. We hope you and your loved ones will join us in finding joy and connection.
